headline: Why Exxon Mobil (XOM) Dipped More Than Broader Market Today
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Exxon Mobil (XOM) stood at $114.68, denoting a -2.62% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: How Recent Developments Are Reshaping The Exxon Mobil Investment Story
summary: Exxon Mobil's fair value estimate has nudged higher from about $129 to roughly $132 per share as analysts factor in a slightly stronger long term revenue growth outlook, with assumptions moving from about 0.83% to around 0.97%. While the discount rate has held steady near 6.96%, recent research highlights resilient cash generation and improved confidence in Exxon's ability to navigate a volatile macro environment, supporting this modest upward shift in perceived intrinsic value. Read on to...

headline: Phil and Penny Knight's donation tops the Chronicle of Philanthropy's list of 2025's biggest gifts
summary: Topping the list was $2 billion from Nike co-founder Phil Knight and his wife, Penny, followed by a $746.7 million donation from Warren Buffett and a $500 million pledge from the mother and stepfather of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos.  Nearly 40% of the $5 billion total came from the Knights’ gift to Oregon Health & Science University.  More than $1.3 billion, or about one-quarter of the total, came from four donations to Buffett family foundations.

headline: DIRTT Reports Continued Year-End Commercial Momentum and Project Wins
summary: CALGARY, Alberta, Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- DIRTT (“DIRTT”, the “Company”, “we”, “our”, “us” or “ours”) (TSX: DRT; OTCQX: DRTTF), a leader in industrialized construction, today reported steady late-year commercial activity supported by accelerating customer decision-making and consistent project volume. headline: U.S. Treasury Blocks Bid for Lukoil’s Foreign Assets
summary: The U.S. Treasury has rejected an Xtellus-led bid for Lukoil’s $22 billion foreign assets, citing sanctions restrictions on the use of frozen securities, complicating efforts to divest the Russian oil major’s global operations.

raw.headline: U.S. Treasury Blocks Bid for Lukoil’s Foreign Assets
